SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num,writer,title,orgFileName,saveFileName, fileSize,regdate FROM board_file
WHERE title LIKE '%${title}%' OR orgFileName LIKE '%'||#{orgFileName}||'%'
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%${writer}%'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND ${endRowNum}

WHERE title LIKE '%${title}%' OR orgFileName LIKE '%'||#{orgFileName}||'%'
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%${writer}%'
mapper.insert: insert into board_file (num, writer, title, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, regdate) values(board_file_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{orgFileName}, #{saveFileName}, #{fileSize}, sysdate)
